ygData.subject: Re: Educating the masses
ygData.msgSnippet: Galtin, I can definitely confirm this.  Whenever my party hunts anywhere with such creatures as Ghouls and Gnoll Soothsayers, they know t o yell root whenever
ygData.messageBody:
Galtin,

I can definitely confirm this. Whenever my party hunts anywhere with such
creatures as Ghouls and Gnoll Soothsayers, they know t o yell root
whenever they are root. One song pulse later and they are free as a bird.

Treilanin
Bard of Kelethin
Honour Guard, Karana Server.

On Tue, 22 Jun 1999, Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn wrote:

> From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>
> In my original post, I made the assumption that singing Selo's broke the
> root for everyone in your group but I guess I could be wrong. If I was
> wrong then I guess I have to retract the first part of the post.
>
